summary:
## USA PATRIOT Act: A Simple Summary

The USA PATRIOT Act was a U.S. law created after the September 11 attacks to fight terrorism. It gave the government more power to watch what people were doing and to hold immigrants without trial. Many people didn't like this law because they thought it took away important freedoms. Parts of the law expired in 2020 because Congress didn't renew them.
title: Patriot Act
